title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, November 6, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of John Philip Sousa (1854), a composer and author who feared recorded music would stop the world from singing.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of John Philip Sousa (1854), a composer and author who feared recorded music would stop the world from singing.
itunes:summary: It’s the birthday of John Philip Sousa (1854), a composer and author who feared recorded music would stop the world from singing.
